programme.title: The Last Dance

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: With Michael Jordan's extraordinary fame came extraordinary scrutiny, and in 1993, it all felt like it came to a head with the Chicago Bulls' pursuit of a third straight title shadowed by question marks about Jordan's gambling.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: As Michael Jordan pushes his teammates hard for a sixth NBA title, his intensity and hunger for basketball dominance is in stark contrast to his mindset in October 1993, when he stunned the world by walking away from the game.

programme.title: The Last Dance
programme.desc: Michael Jordan would famously use even the smallest slight imaginable to motivate himself against an opponent. And when his NBA comeback in 1995 fell short in the playoffs, he worked harder than ever to return to form.

programme.desc: Start the day off right with Chris Canty, Evan Cohen and Michelle Smallmon providing an energizing and informative way to take on the day. Sports, life and laughter are what it's all about.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 17 Jayhawks (16-7, 7-5 Big 12) try to get right as they host the Buffaloes (9-14, 0-12). Kansas has dropped two of its last three following an 81-73 loss at Kansas State. Colorado's 12-game slide coincides with the start of conference play.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 17 Jayhawks (17-7, 8-5) and Utes (13-11, 5-8) meet for the third time, but first in a Big 12 game. Kansas comes off a workmanlike 71-59 win over Colorado behind Hunter Dickinson's 19 points and nine rebounds. Utah has dropped two straight.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 23 Jayhawks (17-8, 8-6 Big 12) try to salvage their Beehive State trip when they face the Cougars (17-8, 8-6). Kansas fell to Utah 74-67 on Feb. 15. Dallin Hall scored 18 points to lead BYU past Kansas at Allen Fieldhouse 76-68 last season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Jayhawks look for the season-series sweep of the Buffaloes in Big 12 action. Kansas renewed pleasantries with Colorado by sentencing the Buffaloes to a 13th straight loss as Hunter Dickinson's 19 points paced a 71-59 victory on Feb. 11.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Jayhawks try to reassert themselves when they visit the Big 12 regular-season champion No. 3 Cougars. Houston claimed a 92-86 double-overtime victory over Kansas at Allen Fieldhouse on Jan. 25. J'Wan Roberts paced the Cougars with 24 points.

programme.desc: Inside access with University of Oklahoma football.

programme.title: OUDNA All-Access with OU Football

programme.desc: The Jayhawks (19-11, 10-9 Big 12) renew their acquaintance with the No. 24 Wildcats (20-10, 14-5). The programs meet for the first time since November 2010. Arizona kicks off its Big 12 Tournament in the quarterfinals on March 13 in Kansas City, Mo.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: If you're a local of New Orleans, you might recognize West African borrowings in music and food but Italian New Orleans has been largely forgotten.

programme.title: OUDNA All-Access with OU Football

programme.title: 30 for 30

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Examining Bob Knight's fall from grace at Indiana University.

programme.title: 30 for 30

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: This is a story about a scrappy onetime oil boomtown, where cooks make the most of scraps and the oppressiveness of brisket and how popular narratives have obscured two Gulf Coast dishes that manage to hang on.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: No. 3 Iowa State tips off with Arizona from the McKale Memorial Center. The Wildcats have won three straight meetings, last beating the Cyclones 71-66 in Hawaii in 2018. Future NBA star Tyrese Haliburton had five assists for Iowa State in the loss.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 16 Jayhawks host a rematch with the No. 8 Cyclones. Kansas leads the all-time series 190-69, but Iowa State has won three of the past four after a 74-57 decision Jan. 15. Curtis Jones (ISU) torched Kansas for 25 points with five 3-pointers.

programme.title: OUDNA All-Access with OU Football
programme.desc: Inside access with University of Oklahoma football.

programme.title: TrueSouth
programme.desc: In the southern towns of Hodgenville and Bardstown, Kentucky, conflicting ideas about identity and purpose come into focus. In these Southern towns, onion burgers and country sausage prove constants in a time of great change.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 25 Tigers (9-3, 1-0 ACC) try to get right as they tangle with the Demon Deacons (9-3, 1-0). Tough-luck Clemson has dropped two straight, both in overtime. Tigers senior forward Ian Schieffelin averages 13.8 points and 12 rebounds per game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Golden Eagles descend on Littlejohn Coliseum to play the Tigers. Clemson beat California 67-59 at the Emerald Coast Classic in 2022 during their only previous meeting. Chase Hunter (CLEM) hit team highs of 14 points and seven assists in that win.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Tigers (18-5, 10-2 ACC) face the No. 2 Blue Devils (20-2, 12-0). Duke boasts the nation's longest win streak at 16 games after an 83-54 drubbing of Syracuse on Feb. 5. Clemson's six-game run ended in a triple-overtime loss Jan. 4 to Georgia Tech.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Tigers complete a three-game homestand against storied ACC schools when the Tar Heels visit. Clemson snapped a three-game slide against North Carolina with an 80-76 road win last season. Ian Schieffelin (CLEM) double-doubled in that victory.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Bluegrass State rivals in the No. 5 Wildcats and Cardinals collide at Rupp Arena. The Wildcats lead the series 39-17 after winning the last two meetings. The programs have met at least once every year, with the exception of 2021, since 1983.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The red-hot Cardinals look to keep rolling when they host an ACC tilt against the Cavaliers. Louisville demolished Syracuse 85-61 on Jan. 14 for its seventh straight victory, and moved to 6-1 in conference play for the first time since 2019-20.

programme.title: College Basketball
